languages.text: {n}Торбальд небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Плох тот хозяин, что зовет Волка в дом. Вдвойне плох тот, что не потчует его свежим мясом, ежели тот уже заявился".
{n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Плох тот хозяин, что зовет Волка в дом. Вдвойне плох тот, что не потчует его свежим мясом, ежели тот уже заявился".

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Un amo que invita al Lobo a su casa es mal amo. Pero peor es el que no ofrece al Lobo carne fresca cuando ya está en la casa».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Un amo que invita al Lobo a su casa es mal amo. Pero peor es el que no ofrece al Lobo carne fresca cuando ya está en la casa».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德不以为然地耸了耸肩，{/n}“引狼入室的主人很可悲，但更可悲的，是野狼明明已经跨过了门槛，但却仍然不肯给它鲜肉的主人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德不以为然地耸了耸肩，{/n}“引狼入室的主人很可悲，但更可悲的，是野狼明明已经跨过了门槛，但却仍然不肯给它鲜肉的主人。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは何気なく肩をすくめる。{/n}「ウルフを家に招く主人は気の毒だ。敷居をまたいだウルフに新鮮な肉を出さない主人は2倍気の毒だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは何気なく肩をすくめる。{/n}「ウルフを家に招く主人は気の毒だ。敷居をまたいだウルフに新鮮な肉を出さない主人は2倍気の毒だ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald hausse les épaules avec nonchalance.{/n} « Malavisé est le maître qui fait entrer le Wolf dans sa bergerie. Et plus encore celui qui ne lui offre pas de quoi se sustenter une fois que le prédateur a franchi sa porte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald hausse les épaules avec nonchalance.{/n} « Malavisé est le maître qui fait entrer le Wolf dans sa bergerie. Et plus encore celui qui ne lui offre pas de quoi se sustenter une fois que le prédateur a franchi sa porte. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald zuckt gelassen mit den Schultern.{/n} "Arm ist der Meister, der den Wolf ins Haus ruft. Doppelt arm ist der, der dem Wolf kein frisches Fleisch anbietet, wenn er die Schwelle schon übertreten hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald zuckt gelassen mit den Schultern.{/n} "Arm ist der Meister, der den Wolf ins Haus ruft. Doppelt arm ist der, der dem Wolf kein frisches Fleisch anbietet, wenn er die Schwelle schon übertreten hat."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Kurt'u evine çağıran efendi zavallıdır. Zaten kapıdan girmişken Kurt'a taze et sunmayansa iki katı zavallıdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "Poor is the master who calls the Wolf into the house. Doubly poor is the one who does not offer the Wolf fresh meat when he has already crossed the threshold."
